intro.text:
Welcome to Mars!

Build the Bosun Cloud Exciter before the Colonist Shuttle arrives or they won't slow down enough... and will die on impact
intro.text2: The base will generate water and iron, but you need to collect enough additional dilithium and beryllium to build the BCE and keep it running
intro.text3:
Press B to see your resource stockpile.
Y to build refineries
Menu to give up 

The shuttle is off!
intro.text4:
Good Luck!
The Colonists are counting on you

bce_build.text:
Congrats! 
Time to build the Boson Cloud Exciter. 
Produces a cloud of particles to decelerate the Settler Pod
